rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with natural lighting and ventilation, serving as a transitional space to the central courtyard. Designed following Vastu principles for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living area adjacent to the central courtyard. Large windows provide ample natural light and cross ventilation, ensuring energy efficiency on a tight budget.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with layout optimized for workflow. Natural light is enhanced by skylights and strategically placed windows to improve air quality and reduce reliance on artificial lighting.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining area that connects the living room to the courtyard, allowing for an outdoor feel while enjoying meals in a comfortable indoor space.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open central space fostering natural ventilation and light. Acts as both a recreational area and a buffer zone for privacy.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Compact guest toilet, designed to be energy efficient with proper ventilation.

openings.description: Large windows are positioned on the exterior walls to maximize natural light and cross ventilation in compliance with Vastu principles.
Solid wooden doors that complement the aesthetic of a farmhouse while ensuring privacy and security on budget-friendly materials.
Skylights are installed in the kitchen to enhance natural illumination and ventilation, reducing artificial lighting requirements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with ample storage and natural light from windows. Designed for comfort and adherence to Vastu principles by orienting the bed in the north-east direction.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom offering sufficient space and ventilation with south-facing windows.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office designed for focus and productivity, equipped with natural light from east-facing windows to harness the morning energy as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom design optimized for water conservation and natural ventilation. Features include low-flow fixtures.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows provide ample natural light while ensuring privacy; aligning with local building norms and Vastu.
Small balconies for ventilation, fresh air, and a connection to the outdoors on a budget-friendly design.
